data.title: Julia Cameron - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Julia Cameron: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

An American journalist and author, she is best known for her commercially successful book, The Artist's Way, which was published in 1992. Her other works include The Writing Life, Blessings, and The Vein of Gold.

Before Fame

She graduated from Fordham University and subsequently worked as a journalist for the Washington Post and Rolling Stone magazine.

Trivia

She taught writing and filmmaking at the Omega Institute for Holistic Studies and at The Smithsonian.

Family Life

Her brief marriage to director Martin Scorsese produced a daughter named Domenica.

Associated With
